alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 5:25PM EDT until June 15 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wayne County in southeastern Michigan... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 524 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whitmore Lake to near Dixboro to Willis, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Belleville around 535 PM EDT. Northville around 545 PM EDT. Romulus and Canton around 550 PM EDT. Flat Rock around 555 PM EDT. Livonia, Taylor and Greenfield Village around 600 PM EDT. Trenton around 605 PM EDT. Wyandotte and Grosse Ile around 610 PM EDT. Dearborn around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Melvindale, Gibraltar, New Boston, Rockwood, Westland, Ecorse, Woodhaven, Lincoln Park, Southgate and Inkster. People attending Canton Liberty Fest , Riverview Summerfest , and Redford Township Summer Festival should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
